name: Volunteers of America Northern New England
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Volunteers of America Northern New England is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness provider based in Brunswick, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $58.2M in Medicaid payments across 32K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $58.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
